quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
author: Plato

quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise; seek what they sought.
author: Matsuo Basho

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

quote: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Maori Proverb

quote: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Knowing what to do is wisdom; doing it is courage.
author: Unknown

quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: A wise man learns more from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Do not be wise in words, be wise in deeds.
author: Jewish Proverb

quote: Wisdom is knowing the right path to take. Integrity is taking it.
author: M.H. McKee
